name: Lunar Mouse Clicker
desc: A festive mouse adorned with Lunar New Year decorations. Click to generate lanterns manually.

upgrades.name: Jade Mouse Charm
upgrades.desc: Enhances the mouse with a jade charm, symbolizing prosperity. Each click generates twice as many lanterns. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Red Envelope Magic
upgrades.desc: Infuses the mouse with the luck of traditional red envelopes, doubling lanterns produced per click. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Lunar Lantern Light
upgrades.desc: A radiant lunar lantern lights up each click, multiplying the lanterns produced. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Fortune Coin Clicker
upgrades.desc: Attaches a fortune coin to the mouse, adding extra lanterns with every click. Mouse and cursors gain +0.1 lanterns for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Dragon's Breath Mechanism
upgrades.desc: Empowers the mouse with the mythical dragon's breath, significantly increasing lanterns per click. Mouse and cursors gain +0.5 lanterns for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Phoenix Feather Touch
upgrades.desc: A touch of the immortal phoenix enhances clicks, creating a burst of additional lanterns. Mouse and cursors gain +5 lanterns for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Celestial Fireworks Display
upgrades.desc: Transforms the click into a celestial-level display, producing an array of lanterns with each click. Mouse and cursors gain +50 lanterns for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Eternal Ember Click
upgrades.desc: The mouse's click ignites an eternal ember, echoing the lantern output of previous clicks. Mouse and cursors gain +500 lanterns for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Mystic Qilin's Spark
upgrades.desc: Channels the mystical energy of the Qilin, causing some clicks to produce a spectacular burst of lanterns. Mouse and cursors gain +500 lanterns for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Emperor's Golden Touch
upgrades.desc: Infused with the Emperor's touch, massively increasing the variety and number of lanterns generated per click. Mouse and cursors gain +5000 lanterns for every non-cursor asset owned.

name: Lantern Assembly Line
desc: An automated assembly line where skilled workers assemble lanterns at an accelerated rate.

upgrades.name: Caffeine Tablets for Workers
upgrades.desc: Doubles the assembly line's efficiency by boosting worker alertness and speed.

upgrades.name: Automated Quality Control
upgrades.desc: Incorporates AI-driven quality control systems, reducing errors and rework to double efficiency.

upgrades.name: Advanced Robotics Integration
upgrades.desc: Adds robotic arms and automated systems, speeding up production and reducing human fatigue.

upgrades.name: Hyper-Efficient Assembly Algorithms
upgrades.desc: Implements cutting-edge algorithms for optimal resource and time management.

upgrades.name: Nano-Materials Handling
upgrades.desc: Utilizes nano-technology for precise handling of components, minimizing waste.

upgrades.name: Zero-Gravity Assembly Zones
upgrades.desc: Introduces low-gravity areas to facilitate easier movement of large components.

upgrades.name: Temporal Acceleration Field
upgrades.desc: Creates a localized field where time moves faster to speed up the assembly process.

upgrades.name: Quantum Synchronization
upgrades.desc: Employs quantum technology for perfect coordination of all assembly processes.

upgrades.name: Galactic Standard Assembly AI
upgrades.desc: Integrates an AI adhering to the highest galactic standards for precision and speed.

upgrades.name: Multidimensional Assembly Manifest
upgrades.desc: Taps into alternate dimensions for parallelized production processes.

name: Red Paper Mill
desc: A paper mill that produces high-quality red paper for wrapping lanterns and crafting intricate designs.

upgrades.name: Enhanced Fiber Treatment
upgrades.desc: Uses advanced chemical processes to strengthen paper fibers, doubling the durability and vibrancy of the paper.

upgrades.name: Precision Cutting Lasers
upgrades.desc: Incorporates lasers for ultra-precise and consistent paper cutting, greatly enhancing production speed and efficiency.

upgrades.name: Eco-Friendly Dyes
upgrades.desc: Introduces organic, sustainable dyes that provide a richer red hue, doubling the quality and appeal of the paper.

upgrades.name: Automated Folding Mechanisms
upgrades.desc: Implements machinery for automatic folding into intricate designs, significantly speeding up production.

upgrades.name: Watermarking Technology
upgrades.desc: Adds unique watermarks to the paper, enhancing its aesthetic and authenticity, thereby doubling its value.

upgrades.name: Solar-Powered Operations
upgrades.desc: Transitions to solar energy, reducing costs and environmental impact, effectively doubling operational efficiency.

upgrades.name: Augmented Reality Design Interface
upgrades.desc: Utilizes AR for real-time complex design visualization, doubling the speed and precision of design creation.

upgrades.name: Zero-Waste Recycling System
upgrades.desc: Establishes a closed-loop recycling system, making the mill more sustainable and doubling overall efficiency.

upgrades.name: Dimensional Paper Weaving
upgrades.desc: Employs advanced weaving techniques, creating unique textures and properties, effectively doubling paper appeal and utility.

upgrades.name: Quantum Ink Infusion
upgrades.desc: Uses quantum technology for special inks that change color and pattern, doubling the paper's uniqueness and market demand.

name: Vertical Supply Chain

upgrades.desc: Taps into resources from multiple dimensions, ensuring an endless supply of materials and effectively doubling the potential of the supply chain.
